SourceAnalyzer.Name: Bashwork Rules Analysis Tracing
SourceAnalyzer.Description: Special analyzer that traces code document elements to "Style Cop Analysis Trace.log" for debugging of rules.

BooleanProperty.Name: EnableElementTracing
BooleanProperty.Description: Indicates whether to dump all element information to a Trace log.

Rule.Name: TracingEnabled
Rule.Context: Tracing is enabled for custom rules.
Rule.Description: This allows you to be able to turn on or off tracing.
